comments.body: please add a todo or file an issue about the outstanding problem here

Please add "as dynamic" to the list of things that increase our technical debt:
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/master/dev/devicelab/bin/tasks/technical_debt__cost.dart

After this, let's link to some of the elements you have referenced here, like `OverscrollIndicatorNotification` and `NotificationListener`. There is a `See also: ...` format that is used in other classes.
The samples here need an overhaul (https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/76489#issuecomment-784465878), probably better for a follow up change though.
Yeah, I didn't address any of that: there are a lot of examples that need some work.

Just noticed that the documentation on NotificationListener.onNotificaiton is outdated: It says "Return false (or null)" and I think you cannot return null. Would you mind updating that in this PR as well?
Curious, why this can be null?
This is intentional, the pattern is the same for GlowingOverscrollIndicator.

Could we name this `scrollDirection` or perhaps `stretchDirection`? the former matches what we usually use in other widgets, like ListView and the later would be ideal if this is mean to be the stretch direction.
This is not the scroll direction or stretch direction. Again this is following the same constructs of the existing overscroll indicator for consistency.
This is because the AxisDirection of a vertical scroll view is up or down, not left or right. This error is correct I think.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +682,686 @@  const StretchingOverscrollIndicator({
    Key? key,
    required this.axisDirection,
    this.notificationPredicate = defaultScrollNotificationPredicate,
    this.child,

comments.body: Maybe also link to the Glow from here and link to this one from the glow?
